rdf:Description.dc:title: Tangible capital assets project : implementation toolkit 2008 implementation toolkit.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Municipal Affairs.
Alberta. Municipal Advisory Services.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Municipal Affairs and Housing,
rdf:Description.dc:description: A tangible capital asset is: "A significant economic resource managed by governments and a key component in the delivery of many government programs". This definition includes items such as roads, buildings, vehicles, equipment, land, water and other utility systems, aircraft, computer hardware and software, dams, canals and bridges.
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat.
Mode of access: World Wide Web.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Alberta. Alberta Municipal Affairs.
Municipal government
